name: Capcom Generation 2: Dai 2 Shuu Makai to Kishi
name_original: Capcom Generation 2: Dai 2 Shuu Makai to Kishi
description:
Capcom Generation 2: Dai 2 Shuu Makai to Kishi (カプコン・ジェネレーション　～第２集　魔界と騎士～) is a Compilation/Platformer 2D video game published by Capcom released on September 23rd, 1998 for the Sony PlayStation & Sega Saturn.
Contains:
Ghost ‘N Goblins
Ghouls ‘N Ghosts
*Super Ghouls ‘N Ghosts
